verses.verse: Paul, an apostle of Yeshua the Messiah by the will of YHVH, according to the promise of life which is in Yeshua the Messiah,
To Timothy, my dearly beloved son: Grace, mercy, and peace, from YHVH the Father and Yeshua the Messiah our Master.
I thank YHVH, whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience, that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day;
Greatly desiring to see thee, being mindful of thy tears, that I may be filled with joy;
When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee, which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois, and thy mother Eunice; and I am persuaded that in thee also.
Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of YHVH, which is in thee by the putting on of my hands.
For YHVH hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Master, nor of me his prisoner: but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the evangel according to the power of YHVH;
Who hath saved us, and called us with an holy calling, not according to our works, but according to his own purpose and grace, which was given us in Yeshua the Messiah before the world began,
But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Yeshua the Messiah, who hath abolished death, and hath brought life and immortality to light through the glad tidings:
Whereunto I am appointed a preacher, and an apostle, and a teacher of the Gentiles.

For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
Hold fast the form of sound words, which thou hast heard of me, in faith and love which is in Yeshua the Messiah.
That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Spirit which dwelleth in us.
This thou knowest, that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes.
YHVH give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus; for he oft refreshed me, and was not ashamed of my chain:
But, when he was in Rome, he sought me out very diligently, and found me.
YHVH grant unto him that he may find mercy in that day: and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus, thou knowest very well.
